name: Shatters
description:
Enter the surreal, tranquil world of SHATTERS.

The object of the game is simple, as always the reality is
much harder.

Tap when the tower enters the safe cube. Time your tap
to perfection or it’s game over!

• Addictive gameplay
• Stunning graphics
• Zen sound track
• Epic slow mo

Have you got what it takes to crush the leaderboard?
